name: Gek-Go!
description:
Student Project

Game Objective

Collect the three gems to activate the portal.  Explore along the way to collect lychee fruit and coins.  Coins require more exploration or a challenge to complete.  Can you find them all?

Gameplay Video

  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4GLpxMjrQow

The controls are as follows:

  • Free Look = Mouse movement / Right thumb stick
  • Move Forward = W / Left thumb stick
  • Move Backwards = S / Left thumb stick
  • Turn Left = A / Left thumb stick
  • Turn Right = D / Left thumb stick
  • Jump = SPACE / A
  • Pause = Esc
  • Reset Camera = Q / Right Thumbstick Click
  • Insert Gem = F / Up on Dpad

Known issues

  • The player can sometimes get stuck inside geometry although this has been reduced
  • motion blur
  • double jump
  • camera jitter when jump ends
  • gecko floats in the air when moving or rotating
  • tilted gecko resulting in a tilt camera
  • screen tearing
  • gecko jitters on corners
  • gecko flips when respawned press jump to fix
  • can walk on empty portal plane
